MPD-WebAMP

This is a TurboGears (http://www.turbogears.org) project. It can be
started by running the start-mpd_webamp.py script.  This project is 
not compatible with python 2.5, please use "python2.4 start-mpd_webamp.py" 
if your system defaults to 2.5.

Playlists

This version of MPD WebAMP assumes that your playlists will be stored in 
the root of your music folder.  Please modify /etc.mpd.conf to point 
your playlists directory to the same directory as your music directory 
if you want to be ble to browse and load your saved playlists.
